page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the people in employment in the area work in Inverness. There are two small shops in the block and one school with one teacher and one canteen lady. There is also a crossing warden for the school children. In the village of Bunchrew there is a game dealer which employs about eight people. There is a number of small crofts and farms most of which are worked by the owners and their families. People who have a croft usually have another job in Inverness. There are people employed on the caravan site although this is mostly seasonal work and some houses provide bed and breakfast accomodation in the summer. There is a residential hospital in the area which employs a number of people.
